meanings.definition: A desirable or useful feature or facility of a building or place.
meanings.sent1: The hotel offers various amenities such as a swimming pool and a gym.
meanings.sent2: The park's amenities include picnic tables and a playground.
meanings.sent3: The amenities of the campsite made the campers feel like they were in a luxury resort.
meanings.sent4: She considered the amenities of the new apartment complex like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The amenities of the spa were so relaxing that she never wanted to leave.

meanings.definition: The pleasantness or attractiveness of a place or situation.
meanings.sent1: The amenities of the garden made it a peaceful retreat from the city noise.
meanings.sent2: The amenities of the beach resort made the vacation truly enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The amenities of the park were so inviting that even the birds seemed to chirp happily.
meanings.sent4: The amenities of the cozy cabin created a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The amenities of the quaint cafe added charm to the small town.
